What a fascinating story indeed! If you're looking for a gripping war-time drama, I highly recommend "The Imitation Game" (2014). This film tells the incredible true story of Alan Turing, a brilliant mathematician who helps crack the German Enigma code during World War II. Benedict Cumberbatch brings Turing to life in this powerful and poignant film.

If you're open to exploring something quite different, I'd suggest "The Country Bears" (2002). This animated musical comedy is a fun and lighthearted tale about a group of lovable bears who must band together to save their beloved concert hall. With a talented voice cast, including Haley Joel Osment and Brad Garrett, this film is sure to put a smile on your face!

If you're in the mood for something a bit more nostalgic, "The Patriot" might be right up your alley! Mel Gibson stars as Benjamin Martin, a farmer-turned-warrior fighting against the British during the American Revolution. It's a classic tale of patriotism and sacrifice that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

I think I have just the thing! Have you considered "A Bridge Too Far"? It's a classic war film with an all-star cast, including Sean Connery and Anthony Hopkins. The story is gripping, following the Allies as they attempt to capture several key bridges in the Netherlands during World War II.

Alternatively, if you're looking for something a bit more unique, I'd recommend "Pan's Labyrinth". It's a beautifully shot film that combines fantasy and reality to tell a haunting tale set during the Spanish Civil War. The performances are excellent, and the visuals are stunning.
